title: GENERAL
fullText:
PV arrays are used to supply power to an application circuit.
Figure 2.1 illustrates the general functional configuration of a PV powered system.
PV array -> Array circuit -> Application circuit

The following application circuit types are considered in this document:
(a) PV array connected to d.c. loads.
(b) PV array connected to an a.c. system via a separated PCE.
(c) PV array connected to an a.c. system via a non-separated PCE
